# Connect with Art

##   
Join the Bermuda National Gallery

Connect with art and discover more with a membership to the Bermuda National Gallery.

Discover more and**gain unique access with a membership to the Bermuda National Gallery**. As a registered charity, your membership allows us to produce everything that we do.

**Renew or join at the _Contributing Membership tier_ to receive****unique access to:**

  * Invitations to exhibition openings for two people: Bring a guest to see the new shows before anyone else, and enjoy a glass of champagne in the gallery after hours.
  * Exclusive Contributing Member events: Go behind the scenes with some of Bermuda’s most dynamic contemporary artists with artist studio tours, and other exclusive events, just for Contributing Members.
  * Reciprocal membership at over 1,400 museums: Enjoy free entry across six countries through the North American Reciprocal Museum (NARM) Association.

**In addition to these benefits,_all BNG Members_ receive:**

  * Exclusive members tours: Join fellow members for memorable and interactive complimentary private tours of BNG exhibitions.
  * Discounts and priority booking: For BNG programmes and education initiatives, including artist lectures and hands-on art workshops for adults and children.
  * Monthly members only arts newsletter: Be the first to hear about upcoming exhibitions and events, plus deep-dive interviews with local artists and creatives.
  * 10% discount: Frameworks and the Stationery ...
collections_text:
The Bermuda National Gallery houses Bermuda’s national art collection and presents innovative exhibitions and programming for every member of your family.

A dynamic nonprofit institution (registered charity #288) with an energetic staff and volunteer team, the contemporary art museum delivers world-class art and culture experiences in the heart of Hamilton. 

**Opening Hours:**

Monday: Closed

Tuesday to Friday: 10am – 4pm

Saturday: 10am – 2pm

Sunday: Closed

**Admission:** Free. 

Free admission is made possible by the Christian Humann Foundation.

## [Current Exhibitions](https://www.bng.bm/exhibition-category/current/)

BNG provides a national platform for Bermudian art and artists, presenting their work alongside international exhibitions. Private tours of current exhibitions can be arranged. Please call ahead to book in advance.

[ ](https://bng.bm/exhibition/michael-frith/)

##### [The Art of Michael K. Frith  
From Pencil to Puppet](https://bng.bm/exhibition/michael-frith/)

The Art of Michael K. Frith: From Pencil to Puppet celebrates the career of one of Bermuda’s most accomplished living creatives and his enormous contributions to the worlds of entertainment, education and popular culture. 

 _On exhibition until Spring 2026_
